CustomField.formula: IF(OR( ISPICKVAL(amc__Milestone__r.amc__Project__r.amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price"), ISPICKVAL(amc__Milestone__r.amc__Project__r.amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price + Expenses") ), (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c) - (amc__Projected_Value_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Completed_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Remaining_Cost__c), ( amc__Projected_Value_Billable__c + amc__Expense_Summary__c + amc__Material_Costs_Remaining__c) - (amc__Projected_Value_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Completed_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Remaining_Cost__c) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the Projected Profit & Loss position for this Action. If Billing Type = Fixed Price, Hours Scheduled Value (Billable) - Projected Value (Cost), otherwise Projected Value (Billable) - Projected Value (Cost)
CustomField.label: Projected P&L
